title: I've finally joined the big dick club.

replies.body: My main owns every rune, every runepage, 97% of the skins, has 200k IP. You're nothing Patchy, still in the SDC.
Why don't you post on your "main" then?
i doubt it because there is a rune cap, can only buy a few more then all the tier 3 runes and a couple of tier 2

Does this mean Batchy owns Lux???
{{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:99}}
Unfortunately, yes.  But don't worry, I can ignore her existence.

> Unfortunately, yes.  But don't worry, I can ignore her existence.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=65weTZUbMTY
Time to buy 9 of every rune, including quintessences!

> Time to buy 9 of every rune, including quintessences!

Reached that stage ages ago. Wait till you reach the stage of combining runes for the hell of it because someone has to use the feature!
I only got lux and kennen left!
Congratulations Batchy! I'm still on the road to all champions. Definitely buying the rest with IP.

How long did this take you? Gotta be at least a few years right.

Lucky for you, the new champ should be out before Christmas. Something to spend IP on.

> How long did this take you? Gotta be at least a few years right.
> 
> Lucky for you, the new champ should be out before Christmas. Something to spend IP on.

Been playing since mid season 2
Oh wow, same :3 Unlike you however, I caved and spent RP on champions, like a fool.
I also spent quite a lot of RP on champs, skins, runpages and w/e. But I earn a lot, so it doesn't bother me at all.
Yeah, most of mine went to skins/runepages.
Curious, who was your last buy? Urgot?

> Curious, who was your last buy? Urgot?

Hiemerdinger.
I have 3 Rune pages and 41 Champs.... wooo 81+Rek'sai to go!
Lel. Batchy thinks hes cool because hes finally hit the " all champions unlocked" "achievement"

I don't think I'm cool. I know I'm cool. 

You are just an angsty virgin.
Batchys mad because im not banned anymore
I'm not mad at all. You will show your true colors again soon and get banned again. You are still just a silver pleb, nothing more.
lololol k
Meanwhile I'm stuck with about 25 champions and nearly no IP left. Barely any skins either.
I can't remember the last time I had less than 30,000 IP ...
I also have 20 rune pages, and every single decent rune.

I don't think I have 20 rune pages, I think I've got 16-17, but the same with the runes.

I play this game a little too much.
Meanwhile, struggling to get 12600 for a rune page and more runes.
Welcome to the League of ridiculous amounts of spare IP that you will never spend.
